phrs.translation: 木屑压碎机；石片压碎机

sentences.sentence: Cedar Point set out to market itself as "The Roller Coaster Capital of the World" with several record breakers over the next decade.
sentences.translation: 在下一个十年里，杉点乐园以其打破的几项纪录的成绩，将它自己打造成为“世界云霄飞车之都”。

sentences.sentence: The breakers dashed on the rocks.
Five men were seen in the sea, struggling with the foaming breakers.
sentences.translation: 五人在大海里，在泡沫飞溅的浪花中挣扎。
